title: Summertime Blossom
overview: At a graduation party, Blake's high school bully, Em Indica shames her in front of Max. Blake's long time crush. Humiliated, Blake meets up with her friends Aften, Kitty and Elias. Maybe a game of spin the bottle can raise Blake's spirits.  Blake goes to Max's house, determined to tell him about her feelings. He is not home, but his unconventional parents are, and they convince Blake she needs to learn how to please their son. Soon, Blake has daddy's dick in her mouth and mommy is giving direction.  It's the 4th of July and Blake is more than ready to share her feelings with Max, but once again Indica is there to reveal all of Blake's secrets and ruin her hopes for happiness. Will Blake's summer end in despair of will it finally blossom?
